long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Neutral News is a tool that takes any news article and processes its content to remove potential biases, emotionally charged language, and other subjective elements. The end result is a set of unbiased, neutral summarized points that represent the core information of the article.

In today's information age, news is often filled with opinionated perspectives and emotional language that can sway readers' viewpoints. Our aim is to offer readers a distilled version of the news, free from potential biases, enabling them to make more informed judgments based on factual content alone.

Locate any news article you'd like to neutralize and just push the button! Our proprietary algorithm will consume and refine the content, producing a list of neutral summarized points. This gives you an objective overview of the article's main points without the emotional or biased overlay.
